hey! i like the idea, i could do the texturing

Got any decent pics, IIRC its that wedge shaped lifting body thing yes? What kind of construction are you thinking of? As i see it most of the shapes involved are pretty specialised to that craft, so going overly modular may be pointless. So perhaps, pod, crew/science part, a central bay part maybe a couple of alts, animated doors etc, tanks that would form the outer hull sections and the tail part and engines, although what that bit looks like is a bit sketchy from memory

hey! i like the idea, i could do the texturing

Will PM you with more of my info.

Got any decent pics, IIRC its that wedge shaped lifting body thing yes? What kind of construction are you thinking of? As i see it most of the shapes involved are pretty specialised to that craft, so going overly modular may be pointless. So perhaps, pod, crew/science part, a central bay part maybe a couple of alts, animated doors etc, tanks that would form the outer hull sections and the tail part and engines, although what that bit looks like is a bit sketchy from memory

I see Crew module, Main Fuselage, Engine, Lwing and Rwing, control surface, Rear Docking Port (1.25 m), Rear body to 3.75 adapter.

Now, Skid i could look at the Biplane skid from Firespitter, and the landing gear i could look into.
